scripts.build: echo 'Building project...' && next build && echo 'Moving _next to next...' && mv out/_next out/next && echo 'Running sed...' && find out -type f -name '*.html' -exec sed -i 's|/next|./next|g' {} + && echo 'Moving index.html...' && mv out/index.html ../extension && echo 'Creating next directory...' && rm -rf ../extension/next && mkdir -p ../extension/next && echo 'Syncing files...' && rsync -va --delete-after out/next/ ../extension/next/ && rm -rf out && rsync -va --delete-after public/next-assets ../extension/
